message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer! I understand that $90 is a good price for you, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we compromise at $110? It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $110. How about we meet in the middle of $110 and $90, which would be $100? That's the best I can do.
